notes.title: Meeting Notes - Q1 Planning
notes.content:
Discussed project roadmap for Q1. Key priorities include:

- Launching the new feature set by end of February
- Improving user onboarding flow with better tutorials
- Expanding the analytics dashboard with more metrics
- Conducting user research sessions bi-weekly

Action items:
- Schedule follow-up meetings with design team
- Create detailed timeline for feature releases
- Set up user testing sessions
- Review competitor analysis

notes.title: Learning Goals 2025
notes.content:
Technical skills to focus on this year:

**Frontend Development:**
- Master Next.js 15 app router
- Deep dive into React Server Components
- Learn advanced TypeScript patterns
- Explore Web Assembly for performance

**AI Integration:**
- OpenAI API best practices
- Vector databases and embeddings
- Prompt engineering techniques
- Building AI-powered user interfaces

**DevOps & Performance:**
- Advanced Vercel deployment strategies
- Performance monitoring and optimization
- CI/CD pipeline improvements
- Docker containerization

Monthly review schedule: First Monday of each month

notes.title: Book Notes: Atomic Habits
notes.content:
Key takeaways from James Clear's 'Atomic Habits':

**The Four Laws of Behavior Change:**
1. Make it obvious (cue)
2. Make it attractive (craving)
3. Make it easy (response)
4. Make it satisfying (reward)

**Important Concepts:**
- Identity-based habits vs outcome-based habits
- The plateau of latent potential
- Environment design for success
- The two-minute rule for starting new habits

**Personal Applications:**
- Set up dedicated workspace for coding
- Use habit stacking for daily routines
- Focus on systems, not goals
- Track progress visually

**Quote:** 'You do not rise to the level of your goals. You fall to the level of your systems.'
